name: JSONParser

methods.name: clearCurrentToken
methods.description: Removes the current token.

methods.name: getBlobValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a BLOB value.

methods.name: getBooleanValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a Boolean value.

methods.name: getCurrentName
methods.description: Returns the name associated with the current token.

methods.name: getCurrentToken
methods.description: Returns the token that the parser currently points to or null if there's no current token.

methods.name: getDatetimeValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a date and time value.

methods.name: getDateValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a date value.

methods.name: getDecimalValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a decimal value.

methods.name: getDoubleValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a double value.

methods.name: getIdValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as an ID value.

methods.name: getIntegerValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as an integer value.

methods.name: getLastClearedToken
methods.description: Returns the last token that was cleared by the clearCurrentToken method.

methods.name: getLongValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a long value.

methods.name: getText
methods.description: Returns the textual representation of the current token or null if there's no current token.

methods.name: getTimeValue
methods.description: Returns the current token as a time value.

methods.name: hasCurrentToken
methods.description: Returns true if the parser currently points to a token; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: nextToken
methods.description: Returns the next token or null if the parser has reached the end of the input stream.

methods.name: nextValue
methods.description: Returns the next token that is a value type or null if the parser has reached the end of the input stream.

methods.name: readValueAs
methods.description: Deserializes JSON content into an object of the specified Apex type and returns the deserialized object.

params.name: apexType
params.description: The apexType argument specifies the type of the object that this method returns after deserializing the current value.

methods.name: readValueAsStrict
methods.description: Deserializes JSON content into an object of the specified Apex type and returns the deserialized object. All attributes in the JSON content must be present in the specified type.

params.name: apexType
params.description: The apexType argument specifies the type of the object that this method returns after deserializing the current value.

methods.name: skipChildren
methods.description: Skips all child tokens of type JSONToken.START_ARRAY and JSONToken.START_OBJECT that the parser currently points to.

description: Represents a parser for JSON-encoded content.
